full_summary:
=====================================================

**Flow Cytometer Acquisition**

**Reference:** WS4171792494-Doc4171832876
** Solicitation Number:** WS4171792494
**Publication Date:** September 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2023 at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** October 3, 2023

**Tender Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of a Flow Cytometer including delivery, training, and annual options for maintenance services after the warranty period.

The requirement is for a site located in Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada. Detailed specifications are outlined in Annex A.

**Notice Details**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada

**Contracting Entity and End User**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name:** Brunet, Luc (PSPC)
* **E-mail:** luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Website:** [Notice URL - https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17365169?extsite=MTczNjUxNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17365169?extsite=MTczNjUxNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

This rewritten text rephrases the original in a professional manner while excluding unnecessary information and adhering to the 400-word limit. The key details of the tender are maintained, including the reference,
